alanMistakes: Alan angase enze amaphutha. Sebenzisa ukuhlakanipha kwezokwelapha. 7/25
name: Igama
noCodeLine: Awunayo noma ikhodi ayilungile? Xhumana nathi lapha
eyeMarqueeLine3: Indoda 25, iso libomvu izinsuku 3, ukwesaba ukukhanya, umbono wehla kancane
eyeMarqueeLine5: Ngabe i-cataract eyezelwe idinga ukudluliselwa masinyane?
eyeMarqueeLine6: Owesifazane 65, ukubona kuncane, akagqoki amagalasi. Ingaphambili lilungile, ilensi imfiphala
eyeMarqueeLine7: Umama ukhathazekile: ingane inepupil emhlophe, ayiboni ngalelo iso
earMarqueeLine3: Insizwa 16, ubuhlungu epinnini izinsuku 2, ukuluma, ukuzwa kulungile
earMarqueeLine6: Indoda 73, ukuzwa kuncane. Inzila ayicaci, ngibona i-wax kuphela
geoInfoText: Ukuchofoza "Ukuchaza indawo" kuzokwabelana ngendawo enembile (ububanzi/ubude) ukuze uthole iziqondiso ezingcono.
frontOfEyeText:
Qhathanisa amehlo: qondile, kwesokudla, kwesobunxele, phezulu, phansi
Sondeza bese ubamba. Hlola: amaphepha eziso, conjunctiva, cornea, pupil
Sebenzisa fluoro ku-ulcer noma imihuzuko ye-cornea
fundalReflexText:
Igumbi limnyama, ingane ijabule; ibanga lengalo—qhathanisa ama-reflex
Okulinganayo: ukukhanya, umbala, ukuma
Sondeza ukuze ubone: isilonda, cataract, RB, Vit Haem
backOfEyeText:
Sebenzisa iso lakho langakwesokudla ukubuka elomuntu elingakwesokudla; langakwesobunxele ukwesobunxele
Umuntu abheke phambili, hhayi ekukhanyeni; sondela uthole i-optic disc (ukudiliza = ukubona kahle)
Hlola i-disc: umngcele, umbala, ikhapu. Landela imithambo emikhulu, bese ucele umuntu abheke ekukhanyeni ukuze ubone i-macula
additionalText_eye:
Yazi ama-disc akho: avuvukele, imithambo emisha, akhonkxiwe, aphaphathekile
>Zijwayeze kaningi<
allAroundEarText:
Hlola: pinna, tragus, mastoid—amacembe, ukuvuvukala noma ukuvuza
Sunduza pinna kancane, uhlolisise ubuhlungu
earCanalText:
Gobeza ikhanda, bamba i-Arclight njengenepen
Donsa pinna phezulu/emuva (abadala) noma phansi/emuva (abantwana)
Faka i-speculum (4,5 mm abadala, 2,5 mm abantwana), phusha izinwele eceleni; jika uma kudingeka
Bheka: iwax, udoti, ukutheleleka
tympanicMembraneText:
Thola i-handle ye-malleus, ukuxubana kokukhanya, ne-attic
Qaphela: umbala, indawo, ukucaca
Bheka ukuqhekeka, uketshezi noma izibazi
additionalText_ear:
Yazi i-TM yakho: ibomvu, ikhuphukile, ihlehlile, iqhekekile
>Zijwayeze kaningi<
generalObservationText:
Hlola amabhawodi, ukushintsha kombala nokusatshalaliswa
Thinta kancane ukuze uzwe ukunwebeka, izinga lokushisa noma ubuhlungu
uvLightText:
Egumbini elimnyama, hlola i-fluorescence:
tinea (oluhlaza-okwesibhakabhaka/oluhlaza), pityriasis versicolor (ophuzi-orensi), erythrasma (obomvu-korali), vitiligo (oluhlaza-omhlophe), acne (obomvu-orensi), ama-nit ekutu (oluhlaza okhanyayo)
dermoscopyText:
Bamba i-Arclight polariser njengenepen, hlola: ABCDE (Ukungalingani, Umngcele, Umbala, Ububanzi >6 mm, Ushintsho)
Bheka: PDSBV (Inethi ye-pigment, Amaphuzu, Imigqa, oluhlaza-omhlophe, Imithambo)
aboutAlanText:
Alan ungumsizi we-AI wokuhlola amehlo, izindlebe nesikhumba, uhlanganisa imodeli yolimi eyisisekelo kanye ne-logic yesimboli. Uhlakaniphile, unesizotha, uyasebenza.

Ulwazi lwendawo, lwezokwelapha nezithombe lwenziwe ngokwezidingo zabasebenzi bezempilo nodokotela. Ingxoxo emfushane inikeza ukuxilonga nohlelo lokwelapha; i-Arclight isetshenziswa kuzo zonke izigaba.
instructionsIntro: Alan ungumsizi we-AI wabafundi nabahlangabezana ngezikhathi ezithile nezinkinga zamehlo, izindlebe noma isikhumba. Bhala noma khuluma ngokusobala, ugweme amagama noma imininingwane ebonisa umuntu. Hlola kahle ikhanda/ubuso/ingxenye efanele, uhlole amehlo nezindlebe zombili. Inhlanhla!
instructionsUseArclight_default: Sebenzisa i-Arclight: phambili, fundal reflex, ingemuva yamehlo.
instructionsJustRight_eye: Indoda 25, iso libomvu izinsuku 3. Ayisebenzi imithi, azikho izinkinga zangaphambilini. Ubuhlungu, amehlo ayakhala, inothi elimhlophe ku-cornea. Amapupile ajwayelekile, umb ono 6/12; iso elinye 6/6.
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Indoda engenile namuhla ineiso elibomvu, ithi ukudla kuyithinte. Ngiyabona amehlo amanzi nemiphetho ebomvu. Ikhathazekile nge-cornea nobuhlungu: ithi ‘Kuyini lokhu?’
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Alan uphendula nemibuzo yokufunda ngamehlo: Kuyini iritis? Ngingayibona kanjani i-retina?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Indoda 25, indlebe ibomvu izinsuku 3. Ayikho imithi noma inkinga eyandulele. Ubuhlungu, ukuvuza indlebe. Igubhu libomvu; ukuzwa kwehle kwindlebe elonakele, kuhle kwelinye.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Indoda engenile namuhla, izindlebe zibomvu, ithi ukudla kumlimaza. Ngiyabona ukuvuza nobomvu. Ikhathazekile ngokuzwa nobuhlungu, ithi ‘Kuyini lokhu?’
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Alan uphendula nemibuzo yokufunda ngezindlebe: Kuyini otitis media? Ngingazihlanza kanjani izindlebe?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Indoda 25, isikhumba sibomvu izinsuku 3. Azikho izinkinga zangaphambilini. Isikhumba sibuhlungu siyawaqhaqhazela.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Indoda engenile namuhla, isikhumba sibomvu, ithi ukudla kumlimaza. Ngiyabona ukuvuza nobomvu. Ikhathazekile nge-pigment nokucasuka, ithi ‘Kuyini lokhu?’
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Alan uphendula nemibuzo yokufunda ngesikhumba: Kuyini eczema? Ngingayibona kanjani inethi ye-pigment?
instructionText: Alan ungumsizi we-AI wabafundi nabantu abahlangabezana ngezikhathi nezinkinga zamehlo, izindlebe noma isikhumba. Bhala noma khuluma ngokusobala, ugweme imininingwane ebonisa umuntu.
